SEARCH
Package org.hibernate.search.mapper.pojo.mapping.definition.programmatic

Interface PropertyMappingKeywordFieldOptionsStep

All Superinterfaces:
PropertyMappingFieldOptionsStep<PropertyMappingKeywordFieldOptionsStep>, PropertyMappingNonFullTextFieldOptionsStep<PropertyMappingKeywordFieldOptionsStep>, PropertyMappingStandardFieldOptionsStep<PropertyMappingKeywordFieldOptionsStep>, PropertyMappingStep
public interface PropertyMappingKeywordFieldOptionsStep extends PropertyMappingNonFullTextFieldOptionsStep<PropertyMappingKeywordFieldOptionsStep>
The step in a property-to-index-field mapping where optional parameters can be set, when the index field is a keyword field.
